title: Our Jonathan Tjarks Tribute (Including a 2018 NBA Re-draft) With Kevin Oâ€™Connor, J. Kyle Mann, and Chris Ryan
description:
The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by Chris Ryan, Kevin O'Connor, and J. Kyle Mann to remember their friend Jonathan Tjarks (2:26). Then in honor of Jonathan, they talk a little basketball and revisit the 2018 NBA draft (43:40).

Host: Bill Simmons
Guests: Chris Ryan, Kevin O'Connor, and J. Kyle Mann
Producers: Kyle Crichton and Isaiah Blakely
